summary: 调用DeleteLakeHouseSpace接口，删除数仓开发中的项目空间。

schema.description: 项目空间ID，可通过调用接口[GetLhSpaceByName](~~424379~~)获取该参数的值。
租户ID，可通过调用接口[GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~)或[ListUserTenants](~~198074~~)获取该参数的值。

ErrorMessage.example: You are not authorized to perform this operation.

Success.description:
请求是否成功，返回值如下：
- true：请求成功
- false：请求失败

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "E76DD2E7-EBAC-5724-B163-19AAC233F8F2",
  "ErrorCode": "NoPermission",
  "ErrorMessage": "You are not authorized to perform this operation.",
  "Success": true
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<DeleteLakeHouseSpaceResponse>
    <RequestId>E76DD2E7-EBAC-5724-B163-19AAC233F8F2</RequestId>
    <Success>true</Success>
</DeleteLakeHouseSpaceResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 删除项目空间
